record.field: A man suddenly begins to experience vivid flashbacksof a life he doesn't remember living, and must unravel the mystery of his pastbefore it consumes his present.
A klutzy wedding planner has to pull off the perfectceremony for a high-maintenance celebrity couple, all while battling their ownhilarious incompetence.

The Corporate Policies and Procedures Manual is acomprehensive guide to all of the rules, regulations, and best practices that governthe operation of a company. It outlines the expectations and responsibilities ofemployees, and provides clear guidance on how to handle a wide range of situationsand scenarios.

The Business Operations Handbook is a vital resourcefor anyone involved in the day-to-day management of a business. It outlines thevarious processes, systems, and procedures that keep a business running smoothly,from finance and HR to sales and marketing.
